job.title: Staff Site Reliability Engineer, Traffic Engineering
job.description:
The Role
Tesla is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join our Core Infrastructure Services (CIS) team. Our team builds, owns, and operates Core Infrastructure Services such as DNS, Load Balancers, Content Delivery Networks and a suite of provisioning tools and services.
We enable our customers on-prem and in the cloud to operate securely and reliably. Our mission is to improve infrastructure effectiveness and increase efficiency for all core services used by the various infrastructure teams at Tesla across the globe.
